summary: A player home Miraak himself would envy!
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Times New Roman][size=5][color=#3c78d8]~~[/color] Description [color=#3c78d8]~~[/color][/size]

[size=3]Player home in/on a ship (Dragonborn themed) with space for you to display unique items and options to alter the interior a bit.
To get the key or sail, go to Dawnstar and buy the ship for a mere 7500 septims.
(To buy: Activate the sign on the dock next to the ship)[/size]

[size=3]You can sail (not actually sail, sort of fast travel) to 7 different locations in Skyrim and Solstheim:
[color=#3c78d8]~[/color] Dawnstar (Ships first location)
[color=#3c78d8]~[/color] Solitude
[color=#3c78d8]~[/color] Windhelm
[color=#3c78d8]~[/color] Near Winterhold
[color=#3c78d8]~[/color] Raven Rock
[color=#3c78d8]~[/color] Near Skaal Village
[color=#3c78d8]~[/color] Near Tel Mithryn
[/size]
[color=#ff7700][size=3]REQUIRES DAWNGUARD AND DRAGONBORN DLCs[/size][/color]

[youtube]2WlweixZhMk[/youtube][youtube]QYtUUlGyOjU[/youtube]
Video: PixelGamer and Hodilton

[size=5][color=#3c78d8]~~[/color] Features [color=#3c78d8]~~[/color][/size]

[size=3][color=#3c78d8]~[/color] Snowed or ashed exterior based on the location[/size]
[size=3][color=#3c78d8]~[/color] Unique and named storage, idle markers for followers
[color=#3c78d8]~[/color] All for smithing, alchemy and enchanting (no staff enchanter)
[color=#3c78d8]~[/color] Map marker (at the ships current location) and horse marker (no Solstheim), cleaned with TES5Edit
[color=#3c78d8]~[/color] 7 different sail to locations (3 hours of game time pass on sailing)
[color=#3c78d8]~[/color] Room for 2 followers or 1 follower and 3 mannequins
[color=#3c78d8]~[/color] Unique displays (they are named) and 4 weapon racks
[color=#3c78d8]~[/color] Change board (next to enchanter) to change stuff around the ships interior
[color=#3c78d8]~[/color] Watchman's stool[/size]

[size=5][color=#3c78d8]~~[/color] Known Issues [color=#3c78d8]~~[/color][/size]
[size=3](Besides Miraak envying you)[/size]

[size=3][color=#3c78d8]~ CTD:[/color] The cells in which the ship is located are near 100% of fullness, so if you have weaker computer, heavily scripted game
or generaly unstable game you might encounter CTDs upon sailing or entering the cell.
[color=#3c78d8]~ Activators don't work:[/color] save and load or leave the cell
[color=#3c78d8]~ Sailing:[/color] If you have a follower and you sail Skyrim to Skyrim location and you lose your follower (which you will), just wait an hour
If you sail Skyrim to Solstheim or Solstheim to Skyrim, followers will get lost and wont come to you even if you wait an hour
(to solve this: make them wait inside the ship and go get them when you reach the desired location)
[color=#3c78d8]~ Change Board[/color] - Followers corner: Do not change if a followers uses the bed !
Before changing mannequins back to a follower, remove all items they have on or you may lose them.[/size]
[size=3][color=#3c78d8]~ Change Bedding:[/color] again, don't change if in use[/size]
[size=3][color=#3c78d8]~ Purchase sign:[/color] If you do not see the purchase sign, try downloading the loose version of the file.
If that doesn't fix the problem (it should), there is a no purchase version.[/size]

[size=5][color=#3c78d8]~~[/color] Compatibility [color=#3c78d8]~~[/color][/size]

[size=3]Not compatible with - mostly clipping issues:
Snow City, JK's Skyrim and Winterhold Reborn
(Read a large post in the comments section for a more precise description)

Compatible - patched:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/72449/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D72449&pUp=1]TPoS
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13608/?]ETaC[/url]

I will NOT make any compatibility patches, because I made this mod for myself, based on what I use.
(plus I like that I can sail in the port of a city, not 3 miles outside it)[/size]

[size=3]If anyone wants to make patches PM me.[/size]

[size=5]~~[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1] [/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/8785167/?tb=mods&pUp=1]My Other Mods[/url] ~~[/size]

[/font][font=Times New Roman][size=3]And a highly recommended mod[/size]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53068/?][size=4]Rigmor of Bruma[/size][/url][size=4][/size]
[size=3]An EPIC 18 mission Quest/Companion Mod

[/size][/font][size=3]Special thanks to:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5650734/?]mrpdean[/url] for the resources from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55154/?]Lakeview Manor Evolution[/url][/size][/center]
author: 1xmiha
